discussion.content:
1. Superviser dashboard
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-service/use/monitor-conversations
2. Route to human agent - implicit trigger. 
As per documentation, can be done with either implicit or explicit trigger.
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-copilot-studio/advanced-hand-off#trigger-handoff-to-a-live-agent

For the second I would choose Fallback topic as this will handle scenarios when a virtual agent cannot provide a satisfactory response. The fallback topic can be configured to transfer the conversation to a queue for live agents, ensuring the customer is routed to the first available human agent.
The first should be Supervisor dashboard. Agent aren't able to see real time conversation, like a conversation monitor.
